website_summaries.verdict: The best budget moving LED light that is affordable enough to buy in sets for a complete mobile setup.
pros: Small rotating light is controllable via music and master control
Can set each individual LED light for different effects and colors
cons: Parts of the light are open to getting dust and dirt onto the lights and important electronics

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and compact
customer_reviews.text: Small and lightweight with some gorgeous lights! Cant say I dont love it!! Its perfect for even a medium sized stage for just one unit which honestly amazes me
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline K.

customer_reviews.title: Better
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair of these because one of the U'King lights of comparable type I bought a few months started malfunctioning. -The Lixada lights are significantly heavier than the U'King lights. -The LEDs are about the same brightness, however, the LEDs in the Lixada lights seem to be better quality and blend much nicer than the U'King. -The Lixada lights are louder than the U'King, both the cooling fans and the servos (motors). Thought they are louder, their noise is only noticeable under very quiet or silent conditions. -So far, I prefer the Lixada over the U'King. We'll see how they stand up over time...
customer_reviews.author: Urszula M. Sharples

customer_reviews.title: Decent Lights but One Had Range of Motion Problems
customer_reviews.text: These aren't bad lights - pretty good quality build and definitely effective, good color and throw, easy communication with the DMX board. But one of them has a range of motion problem and won't turn on the x or y axis completely, putting it out of sync with the others and making it unusable as a moving head (which is why I bought these). I'm going to contact customer service and see if they actually help. Will update my review after that. UPDATE: Customer service never contacted me back after I emailed them. So I returned my original light that was faulty only to find the new one was even WORSE!
customer_reviews.author: Spitfire Theater

customer_reviews.title: Great light for a low price
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these fellas and I am truly impressed. I coupled them with an old Chauvet Obey 10 controller (a controller IS required, by the way, along with some DMX cables) and they work splendidly. You can pan, tilt, change colours, brightness and even strobe with these guys. I just needed them to augment my lighting here in the studio, so I'm not planning on using them live. But if one were so inclined they would do splendidly in a small live setting, and you can daisy-chain as many as your controller can handle. Peace!
customer_reviews.author: Sean Lasaril

customer_reviews.title: Decent Lights with good price
customer_reviews.text: I 'm happy with my purchase. Bright and functional. I tested it in bright room because this will be used on top of displays during tradeshows and convention center is usually bright. Worked perfect out of the box, little instruction needed. In regards to durability, the product is built with strong material, no cheap material here. The rotating heads are fast and precise. It is well worth the investment and I look forward to purchasing more lights soon. I will edit and date my comments to show more pictures as I take them.
customer_reviews.author: LenSpin

customer_reviews.title: Great light for an amazing price
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm impressed for the price. These are the same lights you find online from those scary Chinese companies. These ship from USA and you are always safe with Amazon. Very bright and functional. Instructions suck. I found some videos on YouTube that helped me program them. We use them with my live band and sit them on the floor on either side of the drums. So far very cool. We will see how long they last. Seems to be built pretty rugid
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: Added Fun on Karaoke Night
customer_reviews.text: We got this to add a little splash to Karaoke. The light is bright and shows off multiple colors and even does a fast flash every so often. It can even follow the music but we aren't that technical. Its bright so you need to make sure its behind the screen not in front of it. It has mounting hardware if you want to mount it permanently. It can also be used in a chain of lights (like in a club). We just got the one light.
customer_reviews.author: Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Very poor instructions booklet
customer_reviews.text: The lights work fine, but the instructions are impossible to understand. You have to play/guess what buttons to press for the settings. Have been using them for over a month and the only mode they work in is the one that came set from the factory. Don’t be fooled by the picture provided, the cooors change automatically and go into strobe mode in between roll and color change. With a better instruction booklet that is easy to understand, they would be a much better buy.
customer_reviews.author: TechSupportMiami

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Lixada Moving Head Light is a great product. I've used a pair of these several times within few months after purchase. Definitely improved the stage presentation. Syncing two of these units is the best way to go. Very happy with the purchase and its a great value as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: would be a 5 star rewiew,,,, IF you could just shut off the strobe
customer_reviews.text: A nice light, Poorly designed,, Super bright, and good range of motion, with smooth movement. But that damn strobe effect makes it useless for small to medium venues. Maybe if you are playing the Astrodome it would be a good light... Total waste of money....
customer_reviews.author: Nate92483

customer_reviews.title: Im satisfied with this led light
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my karaoke room, this is the bomb guys. The color brightness is so bright and it makes my karaoke room totally different. I installed it in the middle on the ceiling, and it rotates 360 degree, the light goes entire my room. I love it though
customer_reviews.author: Nguyen xuan hieu

customer_reviews.title: Great Light For DJ’s!
customer_reviews.text: I love this light! Will be ordering probably 2 more! So worth it. The light is bright, and the display panel works perfectly! I think I’ll just use it on my table while DJ’ng and not mount it up on a stand. I love this light!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Great for work!
customer_reviews.text: I love the lights on the product. They are very bright and look professional. I currently work as a D.J and use this for my performances. Would recommend to anyone, Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C. H. Lydon

customer_reviews.title: Work Great In Small Theater
customer_reviews.text: I use these lights in my small theater. They work great and throw a nice pool of light. I can add color to areas and reduce my need for larger more expensive lights. My ceiling is only10 feet high. They worked wonderful in our production of Clue and Dial M for Monster.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Smith

customer_reviews.title: Will not work for long
customer_reviews.text: The light is impressive. But will begin to have loss of colors and motor issues within a month or so. Not worth even the low price. Spend a bit more and get a better unit.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Really good worth getting
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money, instructions are easy to understand and they work great with DMX controllers or on automatic / sound mode.Nice compact unit with ceiling mounting and it is actually very quiet in operation you won;t hear it above the music even in a smaller room.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: like it
customer_reviews.text: Actually love these. Wasn't sure what to expect. Use these in a worship room in a church for 5th and 6th graders and they are always memorized by them
customer_reviews.author: dawn

customer_reviews.title: It is a serious piece of equipment, not a toy.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping . It is a serious piece of equipment, soild build with heavy duty motor and light. The LEDs are so super bright and the moment of the gimble is smooth.
customer_reviews.author: BB Capt.

customer_reviews.title: Bright and beautiful light
customer_reviews.text: Very bright and beautiful light. Quickly turn our basement to the club
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: We used it to light up our Aluminum Christmas tree!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping it would work as an option for our Aluminum Christmas tree. It worked great. We had it set mostly to the very slow steady color change. Every once in a while it would randomly go into a fast strobe mode, so we would have to keep changing it back. Not sure why it would do that. It was very quiet to run which was a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Owens

customer_reviews.title: This is better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This is better than I expected! Totally light up the party. No better price with this quality I have found. Very excited for the upcoming graduation party!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Fan too loud
customer_reviews.text: Fans are too loud for installation in church. Light is bright and good dmx control.
customer_reviews.author: Hemanth Bhagawatula

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome!
customer_reviews.text: All I got to say is wow! These things make a party pop. I did Dj job with these and they were impressive. For the money they rock! Had ppl complimenting me on them. If ur a mobile Dj like me then I highly recommend these. They are very bright so you don't want them blaring in anyone's eyes. Def 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Darryl

customer_reviews.title: Love the design
customer_reviews.text: Both 2 one of them won’t turn on the light but the fan is on. Overall I love the quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Jayson

customer_reviews.title: Great little light.
customer_reviews.text: Great little moving head light. Small form factor but plenty bright enough in a smaller setting. Now the reasons for a 4 star.... bracket sucks in the back for mounting. Hard to get your tool in there to work. Also the fan is a little noisy in these things. Other than those two things they are great. I would buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't have power out option. So I had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Romesh Upadhyay

customer_reviews.title: this light is the best quality for the best price so i loved it ...
customer_reviews.text: this light is the best quality for the best price so i loved it especially when you add fog to so 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: DR C.

customer_reviews.title: They worked for about 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: So the movers stopped responding after 4 months. Trying to see if I can return them.
customer_reviews.author: chris weinheimer

customer_reviews.title: Love these lights
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to be used for parties so that I can setup some dance floor. These are easy to use and operate. Fix and power up, these are ready to go. Love these lights
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: They are bright and move smoothly.
customer_reviews.text: I use 2 of these for backdrop to my single act . DMX them to change colors and move.
customer_reviews.author: DocDee

customer_reviews.title: Love love love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing and great for my mobile dueling pianos show!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: They seem to be holding up. Had about 4 gigs with no failures
customer_reviews.author: Brian Busch

customer_reviews.title: just right
customer_reviews.text: The lights are just what they say they are. worked perfect out of the box
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Light
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light, great amount of light, good blending of color. Only problem is that the fan runs all the time instead of just when it gets warm.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K Hein

customer_reviews.title: Vibrates and makes noise. Faulty unit received.
customer_reviews.text: Just received mine and it was defective. Every time it moves it made a noise and vibrated. Returning and purchasing again to see if it was a fluke. Will update review then if this is the case.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Cordova

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Got this just to try out a moving light at our theatre with the ETC Element board. It works fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: jsowle

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: The lights are very good quality, came in perfect condition, the light output is very bright, multiple modes for colors works as well . The movement is a little slow but the beam seems strong. Good worth of money.
customer_reviews.author: Marc andes

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Work 6 month and after just one color ... Don’t buy this product it’s maybe cheaper but bad quality ...
customer_reviews.author: Juskowiak

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for the money
customer_reviews.text: These lights are GREAT. I am very impressed with how far they illuminate. They move decently quick and are very easy to set up with my DMX 512 board I bought. I would highly recommend buying the wireless receivers for this as well; makes the set up and tear down so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: They are DMX controlled but can work in a Master/ Slave scenario as well. These are perfect! I am using them in a Halloween display whereas they are perfect for the application.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hill

customer_reviews.title: very  good
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about ordering a couple of these but I'm quite happy with them! Plenty of light, smooth action, and these just work great! Even with MyDMX Go controlling them. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Completely Satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.text: I am completely satisfied with this light. In fact, I bought two of them for my own DJ business in South Mississippi! The white is a real white, unlike the blueish 3-in-1 lights. They are extremely bright and compact. they are even brighter than a Chauvet DJ Colorstrip. :)
customer_reviews.author: Diane Desporte

customer_reviews.title: Great light!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this light. We use at our events! Best bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Sturm

customer_reviews.title: Great Light Fixture
customer_reviews.text: Stunning light. I bought it to use in my longing room for kids small dancing party and LOVE the fancy effect it create! Good quality like for professional use.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Berg

customer_reviews.title: Great lights on a budget
customer_reviews.text: Product worked as designed. A little slow, but it’s wonderful for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Raj Beggs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The lights are really amazing and great for big gathering.
customer_reviews.author: MLoong

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Very bright and as described. Cheaper than the others on Amazon, works well
customer_reviews.author: Lucas W.

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: People cannot get over the price I paid, for these units.
customer_reviews.author: Fitzgerald Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Did have a few issues with the fixture resetting, but only during effects.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Brown

customer_reviews.title: Just got mine today. Well built and very bright ...
customer_reviews.text: Great light for the price. Nice and bright, sound activated and dmx well with my chauvet obey.... Works very good in pairs
customer_reviews.author: V. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: I’m impressed with this gadget, much brightness, smooth great looks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage. Bought two of these and put them first ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. Bought two of these and put them first in line in a working DMX setup. Light ONE refused to light up correctly. Send it DMX 134 on it's brightness channel 6 and it blinks and turns off while the other one it stayed on. Light TWO refused to pan L and R at all while ONE worked fine... utter garbage. Waste of time. Don't bother.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S.

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing light!
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used it on stage at an event yet but I’m going to soon! Super excited!! From what I seen so far with it I’m super impressed definitely an excellent light for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: LED Colors Burn Out
customer_reviews.text: These would be great lights, I have 8, 5 out of the 8 have burned out leds after 4 months. I have them mounted to the ceiling and don’t ever move them. Seems to be Red and Green LEDs have the issues.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Rankin

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: This is not lixada brand, this is some China off brand that looks alike.
customer_reviews.author: iknow

customer_reviews.title: At first they worked great! After 30 min of trying them out at ...
customer_reviews.text: At first they worked great! After 30 min of trying them out at home, one stopped spinning the complete way!
customer_reviews.author: GarzaTech

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like you I just want a respect ment
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: good quality of moving head light, i like it
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good and high quality product this is a good product Perfectly and nothing crashes in a product Good price and very good item i like this product Buying this product makes me very happy, pretty good and interesting product item. all items are in accordance with the actual details of this product and the package delivery is quite complete and nothing is lacking. I like the 1. very fast and timely delivery 2. this is a charming product 3. glad i could buy this product 4. Good price for this product I hope my reviews is useful for other potential buyers.
customer_reviews.author: James roe

customer_reviews.title: Great lighting for racing party!
customer_reviews.text: Stunning light. I bought it to use in my longing room for kids small dancing party and LOVE the fancy effect it create! Good quality like for professional use.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Really nice stage light, and works with DMX!
customer_reviews.text: Added this to my existing rig. It's just as good and just as bright as the main brands. Has the mounting bracket included so it can go on your existing gantry. Very happy with this light!
customer_reviews.author: LoQuisha

customer_reviews.title: lights
customer_reviews.text: Great lights, very bright even with daylight coming in windows. Still learning all the different settings. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David

product_meta.title: Lixada Moving Head Light 7x10W Moving Head 4 In 1 RGBW Professional 9/14 Channels DMX-512 DJ lights 100W AC 100-240V Sound Active for KTV Club Bar Party Disco DJ Show Bands
feature_bullets: Professional 9/14 Channels DMX-512 LED stage light.
4 Control Modes: DMX512, master slave, sound active and automatic.
RGBW: Individual control of red, green, blue and white LEDs and mixing.
Strobe effects, adjustable flash rate and beaming angle. LED display for easier operation and low power consumption.
Great for club, DJ show, home party, ballroom, bands, etc.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars139 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
